646:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi sarvāvantaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
646:2: śṛṇu tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyaṃ vidyāmantrānusāriṇāṃ sakalasattvārthasamprayuktānāṃ sattvānām |
646:3: yena jāpyante mantrāḥ yena vā jāpyante akṣasūtravidhiṃ sarvatantreṣu sāmānyasādhanopayikasarvamantrāṇām |
646:4: taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru | bhāṣiṣye ||
646:6: sādhu bhagavāṃ ! tad vadatu asmākamanukampārthaṃ sarvamantracaryānusamayapraviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya sarvasattvānāṃ ca ||
646:13: tadyathā - om kuru kuru sarvārthāṃ sādhaya sādhaya sarvaduṣṭa vimohani ! gaganābalambe ! viśodhaya svāhā |
646:15: śodhanavedhanagṛhṇanavirecanādīni karmāṇi kuryāt prathamamakṣasūtreṣu vṛkṣaṃ cābhimantrayet |
646:17: ekarātraṃ svape tatra svapne caiva sa paśyati ||
646:20: tato'sau sādhako gacchet prātarūthāya taṃ tarum |
646:21: cāpi paśyate svapnaṃ virūpaṃ vā mahotkaṭam ||
646:22: varjayet taṃ taruṃ mantrī anyatraṃ vātha gaccheya |
646:32: phalaṃ teṣu samādāya akupsāṃ prāṇibhiḥ sadā |
646:38: saphalāṃ kurute karmāṃ aśeṣāṃ bhuvi ceṣṭitām |
646:39: pūrvāyāṃ diśi ye śākhā tatrasthā phalasambhavā ||
646:41: karoti vividhākārāṃ yatra siddhiḥ phalaiḥ sadā ||
646:42: yā tu dakṣiṇato gacchet śākhā parṇānuśālinī |
646:43: taṃ japī varjayed yasmāt sattvānāṃ prāṇahāriṇī ||
646:45: akṣaiḥ taiḥ samaṃ japyāḥ śatrūṇāṃ pāpanāśanam ||
646:47: adhaḥ śākhāvalambasthā phalā ye tu prakīrtitā ||
646:48: gacched rasātalaṃ taistu dānavānāṃ ca yoṣitām |
646:49: taiḥ phalaiḥ akṣasūtraṃ tu gṛhītā samprakīrtitā ||
646:50: agho yā yāṃ tu nilayāḥ pātālaṃ tena taṃ vrajet |
646:51: praviśya tatra vai divyaṃ saukhyāmāsādya jāpinaḥ ||
646:55: gatvā tu dūrataḥ sthānaṃ śucau deśe tathā nityam ||
646:59: tṛsaptaraṣṭa ekaṃ vā vārāṃ te ekaviṃśati ||
646:69: grathenmantrī sadā hyukto akṣamālāṃ tu yatnataḥ ||
646:70: sauvarṇamatha rūpyaṃ vā māṇikyaṃ sphāṭikaṃ samam |
646:71: śaṅkhaṃ susāraṃ caiva mauktaṃ vāpi vidhīyate ||
646:75: anyaṃ vā gulikāṃ kiñcit phalairvā dhātusambhavaiḥ ||
646:77: śatāṣṭaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vā pañcāśaṃ caiva madhyamām ||
646:79: sahasraṃ sāṣṭakaṃ caiva kuryānmālāṃ tu jyeṣṭhikām ||
646:81: tato grathitumālā vai trimātrāṃ dvika eva vā ||
646:89: snātvā śubhe ambhe sarite vāpi nirmale ||
646:95: prakṣālya yatnato tasmāt tato gaccheduḍayaṃ tathā ||
646:96: yathāsthānaṃ tu gatvā vai yatrāsau paṭamadhyamaḥ |
646:98: śāstubimbe tathā nityaṃ bhuvi dhātuvare jine |
646:104: parijapya tato mālāṃ rātrau tatraiva saṃnyaset |
646:109: saphalaṃ siddhyaṃte mantrī dhruvaṃ tasya vidhikriyā ||
646:111: svapne yadyasau dṛṣṭvā mālāṃ dadyā tathaiva ca ||
646:112: amoghaṃ tasya siddhyante mantrā sarvārthasādhakā || iti |
646:114: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād madhyamapaṭavidhānavisarād dvādaśamaḥ akṣasūtravidhipaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti ||
